code:
import axios from 'axios'; //指向后端路由的url

const url = 'http://localhost:5000/posts';
export const fetchPosts = () => axios.get(url); //把数据通过api发送给后端

export const createPost = newPost => axios.post(url, newPost); //更新数据

export const updatePost = (id, updatedPost) => axios.patch(`${url}/${id}`, updatedPost); //删除帖子

export const delelte = id => axios.delete(`${url}/${id}`); //点赞加1

export const likePost = id => axios.patch(`${url}/${id}/likePost`);
